data.scheme_name: NEDFi Opportunity Scheme for Small Enterprises (NoSSE)-Existing
data.benefits: Long term financial assisatnce of up to a maximum of Rs.100 lakhs in the form of term loan or working capital or combination of both
data.eligibility: Local small entrepreneurs of North East India.
data.conditions: Long term financial assistance will be provided only  for setting up new industrial and infrastructure projects as well as for expansion, diversification or modernisation of existing industrial enterprises
data.beneficiaries: All local Small Enterprises in North East India
data.context: The scheme aims at providing long term financial assistance for setting up new industrial and infrastructure projects as well as for expansion, diversification or modernisation of existing industrial enterprises, excluding commercial real estates.
data.objective: The scheme aims at providing long term financial assistance for setting up new industrial and infrastructure projects as well as for expansion, diversification or modernisation of existing industrial enterprises, excluding commercial real estates.
data.description: If the project cost is above Rs.50 lakhs and up to Rs.200 lakhs loan component up to a maximum of Rs.100 lakhs in the form of term loan or working capital or combination of both.
data.funding_facilitator: North Eastern Development Finance Corporation Limited (NEDFi)
data.website: NEDFi Opportunity Scheme for Small Enterprises (NoSSE) (msme.gov.in)
data.checklist_info_a:
1.) Udyam Registration Certificate    
2.) PAN Card copy  
3.) Details of Bank account 
4.) Latest Audited Balance Sheet
5.) Undertaking as per enclosed format
data.checklist_info_b: NEDFi Opportunity Scheme for Small Enterprises | North Eastern Development Finance Corporation Ltd.
data.checklist_info_d:

data.location: Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Nagaland, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Tripura, Sikkim
data.beneficiary: Manufcaturing Industry-North East Regions- All Entities-Small Enterprises
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
